weloveclouds.server.store

Class MovablePersistentStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • weloveclouds.server.store.KVPersistentStorage
        • weloveclouds.server.store.MovablePersistentStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataAccessService

    public class MovablePersistentStorage
extends KVPersistentStorage
    Represents a KVPersistentStorage, whose entries and storage units can be filtered, removed, or new storage units can be added to that.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class weloveclouds.server.store.KVPersistentStorage

      • putEntries

        public void putEntries(java.util.Set<MovableStorageUnit> fromStorageUnits)
                throws StorageException
        Saves the entries from the parameter storage units into this persistent storage.
        Parameters:
        fromStorageUnits - from where the entries will be copied
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • filterEntries

        public java.util.Set<MovableStorageUnit> filterEntries(HashRange range)
        Filters those entries from the persistent storage whose keys are in the specified range.
        Parameters:
        range - within that shall be the hash values of the keys
        Returns:
        the storage units of those entries whose keys are in the given range
        Throws:
        StorageException - if an error occurs

      • removeEntries

        public void removeEntries(HashRange range)
                   throws StorageException
        Removes those entries from the persistent storage whose keys are in the specified range.
        Parameters:
        range - within that shall be the hash values of the keys
        Throws:
        StorageException - if an error occurs

      • defragment

        public void defragment()
        Merges those storage units which are not full yet. Updates the #unitsWithFreeSpace accordingly after the operation is finished.
